title: newspaper in pdf
content:
Hello,

I am a graphic design student from Arnhem, The Netherlands, I was  
wondering if anybody has a pdf file of an original American newspaper,  
that was ment for printing, photo's and ads included.  
it does'nt matter from which date the paper comes.  
It is part of a case study for turning a book into a paper, and in reverse.  
Also the thematics play a large role.

Thanks in advance!
author: Amber Dean

comments.content:
Maybe this will help you:

[http://www.newseum.org/todaysfrontpages/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829093532/http:/www.newseum.org/todaysfrontpages/ "http://www.newseum.org/todaysfrontpages/")

peace
Sure helps for the time, thanks!. if anyone has more editable files, i will be gratious.
